comment._content: Always makes me feel weird, that almost all of, if not all of, these people are no longer alive.

comment.author: 26206860@N03
comment._content: It's insane to see how football has grown since then. That entire stadium probably holds 2 or 3 thousand fans at best. Now the University of Tennessee holds up to 105K!
